This project is a Vite + React static blog styled after https://0oxo0.neocities.org/. It includes:
- Blog posts in Markdown
- Giscus for comments
- Email subscription (Mailchimp/Buttondown)
- Netlify deployment ready

Copilot should generate code that is clean, accessible, and easy to maintain.
